mapper.select: select * from ( select employee_id id, first_name firstName, last_name lastName, email, phone_number phoneNumber, hire_date hireDate, job_id jobId, salary, commission_pct commissionPct, manager_id managerId, department_id departmentId from employees order by employee_id desc ) where rownum <= #{value}

select employee_id id, first_name firstName, last_name lastName, email, phone_number phoneNumber, hire_date hireDate, job_id jobId, salary, commission_pct commissionPct, manager_id managerId, department_id departmentId from employees where employee_id in (select distinct manager_id from employees where manager_id is not null)

select employee_id id, first_name firstName, last_name lastName, email, phone_number phoneNumber, hire_date hireDate, job_id jobId, salary, commission_pct commissionPct, manager_id managerId, department_id departmentId from employees where employee_id in (#{value})
mapper.insert: insert into employees (employee_id, first_name, last_name, email, phone_number, hire_date, job_id, salary, commission_pct, manager_id, department_id) values (employees_seq.nextval, #{firstName}, #{lastName}, #{email}, #{phoneNumber}, sysdate, #{jobId}, #{salary}, #{commissionPct}, #{managerId}, #{departmentId})
mapper.update: update employees set first_name = #{firstName}, last_name = #{lastName}, email = #{email}, phone_number = #{phoneNumber}, job_id = #{jobId}, salary = #{salary}, commission_pct = #{commissionPct}, manager_id = #{managerId}, department_id = #{departmentId} where employee_id = #{id}
